items.content_html: conditio is a lightweight JavaScript library that provides a simple and expressive way to write conditional expressions with return values. It allows you to define conditions and corresponding results using a set of conditional functions.The library is easy to use and can be installed via npm.
items.title: ousc/conditio.js: conditio is a lightweight JavaScript library that provides a simple and expressive way to write conditional expressions with return values. It allows you to define conditions and corresponding results using a set of conditional functions.The library is easy to use and can be installed via npm.
